_note: AUTO-GENERATED — do not edit directly. Edit stage-operator-dictionary.yaml and re-run: node --import tsx scripts/src/startup-loop/generate-stage-operator-views.ts

stages.outcome_operator: Clear problem statement with articulated pain, affected customer, and evidence of real demand.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to DISCOVERY-02 Solution-space scan.

stages.outcome_operator: Mapped solution space with at least three distinct options and comparative feasibility notes.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to DISCOVERY-03 Option selection.

stages.outcome_operator: Selected solution option with rationale, key assumptions, and handoff brief for DISCOVERY intake.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to DISCOVERY-04 Naming handoff if a business name is still needed, otherwise proceed to DISCOVERY Intake.

stages.outcome_operator: Validated business or product name with brand-safety check and domain availability confirmed.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to DISCOVERY-05 Distribution planning.

stages.outcome_operator: Distribution plan with ≥2 launch channels, cost/effort estimates, and ICP fit rationale.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to DISCOVERY-06 Measurement plan.

stages.outcome_operator: Measurement plan with tracking method, ≥2 key metrics, success thresholds, and data collection feasibility confirmed.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to DISCOVERY-07 Operator evidence.

stages.outcome_operator: Operator evidence packet: launch surface, stock status, pricing model, channel pre-decisions, and open evidence gaps documented.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to DISCOVERY Intake with all seven precursors complete.

stages.outcome_operator: Structured startup context packet ready for all downstream stages.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Run /lp-readiness to check gate readiness before moving to S1.

stages.outcome_operator: Readiness report with blocker list. All 7 gates checked.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Resolve any blockers, then proceed to measurement setup (pre-website) or historical baseline (website-live).

stages.outcome_operator: Analytics stack live with GA4, Search Console, and conversion events verified before any paid traffic.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Confirm measurement setup is Active, then proceed to S2 Market intelligence.

stages.outcome_operator: Consolidated business history document with net value, booking data, and traffic logs as a decision baseline.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to S2 Market intelligence once baseline is Active.

stages.outcome_operator: Decision-grade market intelligence pack covering competitors, demand, pricing, and channels.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to S2B Offer design once market intelligence is Active.

stages.outcome_operator: Offer artifact: target customer, positioning, pricing model, and messaging hierarchy.
stages.operator_next_prompt: S3 Forecast and S6B Channel strategy can now run in parallel.

stages.outcome_operator: 90-day P10/P50/P90 revenue forecast with assumption register and sparse-evidence guardrails.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Forecast and S6B Channel strategy must both complete before S4 Baseline merge.

stages.outcome_operator: Adjacent product research results: 5-10 candidate product types with feasibility flags and ICP fit scoring for product range expansion.
stages.operator_next_prompt: S3B is non-blocking at S4. Share results artifact as optional go-item candidates with S5A Prioritize.

stages.outcome_operator: Channel plan with 2-3 selected launch channels, 30-day GTM timeline, and SEO strategy.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Both S3 Forecast and S6B must complete before S4 Baseline merge.

operator_microsteps.label: Strategy design complete
operator_microsteps.description: Channel hypothesis and strategy design are complete. Requires S2B offer artifact. Allows channel plan artifact generation. Does not require measurement verification.

operator_microsteps.label: Spend authorization
operator_microsteps.description: Spend activation gate. Requires decision-grade measurement signal verified (GATE-MEAS-01 pass). Blocks any live spend or channel activation until measurement thresholds are met.

stages.outcome_operator: Candidate baseline snapshot and draft manifest combining offer, forecast, and channel artifacts.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to S5A Prioritize.

stages.outcome_operator: Scored and ranked action list — top 2-3 items to work on next.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to S5B BOS sync to persist prioritization outputs.

stages.outcome_operator: Business OS cards and stage docs persisted to D1. Manifest pointer committed.
stages.operator_next_prompt: S6 Site-upgrade and S7 Fact-find can now proceed.

stages.outcome_operator: Site upgrade brief with prioritized improvement backlog derived from competitor best-of analysis.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to S7 Fact-find.

stages.outcome_operator: Planning-grade fact-find brief with evidence, open questions, and routing packet.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to S8 Plan.

stages.outcome_operator: Sequenced implementation plan with confidence-gated tasks and validation contracts.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to S9 Build when plan confidence is sufficient.

stages.outcome_operator: Implemented feature or artifact with validation evidence and plan task statuses updated.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to S9B QA gates before launch.

stages.outcome_operator: QA gate pass evidence: conversion flows, SEO readiness, performance budget, and legal compliance verified.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to S10 Weekly decision loop.

stages.outcome_operator: Weekly K/P/C/S decision document with denominator-valid KPI assessment and next actions.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Repeat weekly. Run standing refresh prompts on monthly/quarterly cadence.
